thread.title: Mrs. Dianne leigh
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Mrs. Dianne leigh

author: Mrs. Dianne leigh
title: Mrs. Dianne leigh
text: I had 2 tyres fitted for a great price, unfortunately one failed after a couple of weeks, I rang tyres on the drive, they came out the next day, I had to pay as it may have been a puncture etc. There was no puncture so they refunded me straight away, no fuss, no problem, I will 100% use them again.
